title: Red vs blue Season 7 logo font
content:
Hello everyone, I'm looking for the font of Red vs Blue title of season 7, “Recreation”, to make a personal composition in Photoshop.  
The letter "C" seems characteristic to me, anybody knows the name of this font?

P.S. : I don't need the font of the logo, Jenkins 2.0 ^^

Sébastien C.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822150816im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logoseason7_6304.jpg)
author: sebkotaro

comments.content:
FF Din Black is the closest match I could find, but other eagle-eyed members may be able to find a better match.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822150816/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din/")
I found Formula-TS-Bold, but I think I will deep-etch this title.
